trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a karakterláncot, amely egyedileg azonosítja a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A karakterlánc, amely egyedileg azonosítja a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A karakterlánc, amely funkcióinak lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This string typically returns the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: Ez a karakterlánc általában szöveget adja vissza a azonos biztosított a hozzájuk tartozó vezérlőelem.

trans-unit.source: The string describing the functionality of the element.
trans-unit.target: A karakterlánc, amely az elem funkcióit.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref> that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> a a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref> céloz, amely a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> ez társított <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method can retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Például, ha a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>vezérlő <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>metódus kérheti le <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> társított</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> elem

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> elem által megcélzott a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>.
